name: John B. BELL, petitioner, v. NEW YORK STATE HIGHER EDUCATION SERVICES CORPORATION, et al.
name_abbreviation: Bell v. N.Y. State Higher Educ. Servs. Corp.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
John B. BELL, petitioner,
v.
NEW YORK STATE HIGHER EDUCATION SERVICES CORPORATION, et al.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until March 16, 2015, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
John B. BELL, petitioner,
v.
NEW YORK STATE HIGHER EDUCATION SERVICES CORPORATION, et al.
No. 14-7701.
Supreme Court of the United States
Feb. 23, 2015.
Opinion
